sect1.title: Aerosol and SDR Retrieval as BEAM plugin
sect1.para:
As a BEAM plugin, the Aerosol and SDR Retrieval processor needs the following software to be installed in advance:
BEAM, version 4.7
The BEAM software can be obtained from the BEAM download page (www.brockmann-consult.de/beam). Note that the MERIS/(A)ATSR Synergy Toolbox software has been developed in the frame of BEAM 4.7 and is not compatible with older BEAM versions.

The MERIS/(A)ATSR Synergy Toolbox software delivery consists of four jar files, the modules for aerosol and SDR retrieval, cloud screening and adjusted BRR (Bottom of Rayleigh Reflectance) and SDR (Surface Directional Reflectance) modules, which provide additional Java classes used by the toolbox:
synergy-core-1.1.jar
synergy-aerosol-retrieval-1.1.jar
synergy-preprocessing-1.1.jar
synergy-cloud-screening-1.1.jar
beam-aatsr-recalibration-1.1.jar
beam-meris-brr-2.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
beam-meris-sdr-2.3-SNAPSHOT.jar
These files need to be copied into the 'modules' folder of the BEAM installation (). Note that existing versions of these jar files need to be replaced/overwritten. There should not be more than one jar file for each of these modules in the 'modules' folder!

sect1.title: Lookup Tables
sect1.para:
To be able to process all options properly, the MERIS/(A)ATSR Synergy Toolbox processor needs the following lookup tables:
Ocean aerosol LUTs (provided by FUB)
Land aerosol LUTs (provided by USwansea)
Currently, these LUTs are provided by FUB and USwansea on request. Automatic access is in preparation. The LUTs can be deployed anywhere on disk, the path needs to be specified in the User Interface when running the processor.

sect1.title: Additional Requirements
sect1.para:
To be able to process all options properly, the MERIS/(A)ATSR Synergy Toolbox processor needs the following add-ons to be installed in BEAM (if not already done):
MERIS L2 Auxdata module
GETASSE30 DEM
GETASSE30 DEM reader
The MERIS L2 Auxdata and the GETASSE30 DEM reader can be installed with the BEAM module manager. See BEAM help documentation for details (http://www.brockmann-consult.de/beam/doc/help/visat/ModuleManager.html). The GETASSE30 DEM can be downloaded from the BEAM download page. See also BEAM help documentation (http://www.brockmann-consult.de/beam/ doc/help/visat/GETASSE30ElevationModel.html).
